name: Costarica
description: Costa Rica is a rugged, rainforested Central American country with coastlines on the Caribbean and Pacific ,known for its beaches, volcanoes, biodiversity , and forests.

name: Santorini
description: Santorini is one of the Cyclades islands in the Aegean Sea.They overlook the sea, small islands to the west and beaches made up of black, red and white lava pebbles.

name: Mallorca
description: Mallorca (Majorca) is one of Spain's Balearic Islands in the Mediterranean , known for beach resorts, sheltered coves, limestone mountains ,Roman ,Moorish remains.

name: Thailand
description: Thailand is a Southeast Asian country. It's known for tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins and ornate temples displaying figures of Buddha representing Thailand.

name: Italy
description: A European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, left a powerful mark on Western culture and cuisine. Its capital, Rome, is home to the Vatican ruins.

name: California
description: California, a western U.S. state, stretches from the Mexican border along the Pacific for nearly 900 miles. Its terrain includes cliff-lined beaches, the Sierra Nevada Mountains
